name: Battle X 2 V. 0.02: Van Helsing
description:
In this update I added:

  • An small upgrade system.
  • A load and save system.
  • Screen transition.
  • Two new towers.
  • A new enemy.
  • Enemies now drop white ghosts.
  • all towers now have a cost.

bugs That still need to be fixed:

  • Winnie the Pooh's upgrade needs some work.
  • I have another enemy to add, along with new towers.
  • I might make a shop.

Any feedback would be appreciated.
